          <title>
            <string language="en">Image created by a converging lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild erstellt durch eine zusammenlaufende Linse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Image créée par un objectif convergent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagem criada por uma lente converging</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine creata da un obiettivo converging</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα που δημιουργείται από έναν συγκλίνοντα φακό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imagen creada por una lente convergente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that a converging lens produces an inverted image of the lamp on the screen.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inverted image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß eine zusammenlaufende
Linse ein umgekehrtes Bild der Lampe auf dem Bildschirm produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre qu'un objectif 
convergent produit une image inversée de la lampe sur l'écran.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que uma lente 
converging produz uma imagem invertida da lâmpada na tela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che un obiettivo 
converging produce un'immagine invertita della lampada sullo schermo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι ένας συγκλίνων 
φακός παράγει μια εικόνα του λαμπτήρα στην οθόνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que una lente 
convergente produce una imagen invertida de la lámpara en la 
pantalla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lampe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
